# sessionIdentifiers

**Instance Property**

The identifiers for the keyboard sessions that report metrics to the sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var sessionIdentifiers: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

A keyboard session begins when the system presents the keyboard and ends when the system dismisses it.

## Inspecting Keyboard Configuration and Sessions

- **duration**: The duration that the report spans.
- **keyboardIdentifier**: The identifier of the keyboard in the keyboard list.
- **version**: The version of keyboard metrics.
- **width**: The width, in millimeters, of the keyboard in the report.
- **height**: The height, in millimeters, of the keyboard in the report.
- **inputModes**: The active keyboard languages in the session.
